data.name: Dwarffarian
data.detailed_description:
The thirty years' war between the dwarves and elves has come to an end - a shaky pact of peace has been concluded. The lords of the mountains and mines showed endurance in the war of attrition and formally emerged victorious, imposing their terms on the Dark Kingdom. The main character is a simple infantryman who, at the end of the war, was able to return to his hometown.

- In the tradition of old RPG games

- Large beautiful locations and mysterious landscapes

- Underground gnome cities open for exploration

- Cozy campfire evenings and night battles

- Going to dangerous dungeons is the most important part of the gameplay

A special stake in the game is made on the comfort and "warmth" of the atmosphere. The characters you meet on the way will tell you about the past of this world, and will give you the opportunity to play the role of other magical creatures. One of the main "emotions" of the game is the beauty of the fantasy landscapes. The game process is unhurried, and develops gradually with immersion in the story of the protagonist.

Dwarffarian is conceived as the first part of a great journey and story related to the main character.

data.short_description: Dwarffarian is an indie RPG adventure game where the main character is a dwarf. You have to travel through several fantasy locations, meeting various creatures on the way, completing quests, fighting enemies in dungeons and on open maps.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian, German
*languages with full audio support
